meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: THE DELL DUDE HAS A NAME!
The long, strange lives behind the faces of America's most famous brands.

div.div: HE'S HAD IT WITH YOUR APATHY

div.a: Watch Samuel L. Jackson Tell Voters To 'Wake The F**k Up'

div.div: Samuel L. Jackson is following in the footsteps of Sarah Silverman in a hilarious anti-Mitt Romney video entitled "Wake The F**K Up."

div.a: This Russian Single-Handedly Prevented Nuclear War

div.div: On September 26, 1983, the world came very close to nuclear war.

div.div: YOU'RE NOT PLAYING BLACKJACK

div.a: Double Down: A Brief History Of The Most Meaningless Phrase In Tech

div.div: A gambling term has become the go-to phrase for CEOs â€” frequently with disastrous results.

div.div: NOT OK

div.a: Stop Selling Former Meth Labs To Unsuspecting Buyers, Freddie Mac

div.div: "When my wife and I learned that we could afford a home, we thought it was too good to be true. It turned out that it was."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PagilK&via=Digg&text=Stop Selling Former Meth Labs To Unsuspecting Buyers, Freddie Mac

div.div: DRIVERLESS BUSSES?

div.a: How Driverless Cars Would Reshape The Transit System

div.div: The big opportunity of robocars isn't the cars themselves; it's how they could create a far more efficient transportation system.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SnSMTg&via=Digg&text=How Driverless Cars Would Reshape The Transit System

div.div: HINTS OF OLD SPICE

div.a: Brewmaster Makes Beer From His Beard

div.div: Rogue Ales, a brewery and pub based in Newport, Ore., is developing an ale made out of yeast harvested from the beard of award-winning brewmaster John "More Hops" Maier.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uv6CAP&via=Digg&text=Brewmaster Makes Beer From His Beard

div.div: APPLE
Forget the maps farrago. Look at Apple's agony over the TV puzzle. Apple is frustrated because there is no solution to TV that will let Apple keep doing what it has been doing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P8auFu&via=Digg&text=TV Will Be Apple's Undoing

div.div: MUST BE WELL-READ IN DAVID BROOKS

div.a: Satire Jobs Tumblr Cuts Ivory Tower Hiring Down To Size

div.div: "UCLA is hiring an assistant professor in Latina culture and literature who will also be a part of our interdisciplinary seminar on Kant. Secondary specialization must include colonial American literature, 1990s cyberpunk, graphic novels, and the history of the Jew's harp in Thailand," mock the unrealistic qualifications colleges and universities expect from applicants.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QICHEo&via=Digg&text=Satire Jobs Tumblr Cuts Ivory Tower Hiring Down To Size

div.div: WHO WINS?

div.a: Google Vs. Apple: The Amazing Maps Race

div.div: The iPhone 5 has been a hit with consumers. But the accompanying iOS 6 maps app - not so much. Reuters puts the heavily panned product to the test against Google in bustling Hong Kong.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/THmUfc&via=Digg&text=Google Vs. Apple: The Amazing Maps Race

div.div: PHOTOGRAPHY

div.a: Is This The First Faked Photo?

div.div: Errol Morris was obsessed with this famous 1855 photograph, purported to be one of the first photos ever taken of war. Should it also hold the title of first faked photograph?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sl1ull&via=Digg&text=Is This The First Faked Photo?

div.div: IVY LEAGUE TROLLS

div.a: Drunken Cornell Students Troll The New York Times

div.div: Sounds like the newfound Trolling Department at Cornell University is churning out some real thought leaders.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P9w1O7&via=Digg&text=Drunken Cornell Students Troll The New York Times

div.div: PARANOIA
Wi-Fi uses the same radio frequency as your microwave oven. Does that mean Wi-Fi is dangerous to your health?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SDQEIx&via=Digg&text=Can Wi-Fi Harm Your Health?

div.div: TIME TRAVEL

div.a: 'Looper' And The Real Science Of Time Travel

div.div: A theoretical physicist at MIT shares what we actually know about toying with the arrow of time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SEvie7&via=Digg&text='Looper' And The Real Science Of Time Travel

div.div: WHO NEEDS PIMPS WITH FRIENDS LIKE THESE

div.a: Gangs Recruiting Young Prostitutes Over Facebook

div.div: Police detectives say young girls are being lured into a life of a prostitution and drugs by gang members who are stalking their Facebook pages.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NP9CJU&via=Digg&text=Gangs Recruiting Young Prostitutes Over Facebook

div.div: MISSION ACCOMPLISHED

div.a: Mars Rover Finds Beds Of Ancient Flowing Water

div.div: Scratch water off NASA's Mars rover Curiosity's list of things to find in a two-year quest to learn if the planet most like Earth in the solar system could have supported microbial life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SFr2e5&via=Digg&text=Mars Rover Finds Beds Of Ancient Flowing Water

div.div: IT'S JUST AN iPAD
Some heads are still spinning after an iPad got swiped in San Francisco yesterday, and the alleged thieves then went on a rampage in order, it seems, merely to get away.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OYdARX&via=Digg&text=Crazy iPad Theft Witnessed By '50,000'

div.div: CASH MONEY

div.a: Facebook Letting You Gift Real Gifts To Your Friends

div.div: Facebook on Thursday unveiled Gifts, the companyâ€™s major initiative into the world of social gift giving and e-commerce.

li.div: Remember when Facebook let you throw sheep at your pals? Now you can buy them something instead. via @MikeIsaac allthingsd.com/20120927/say-he...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OY0sfO&via=Digg&text=Facebook Letting You Gift Real Gifts To Your Friends

div.div: IT'S BECAUSE WE'RE FRIENDS, RIGHT?

div.a: Why Obama Is Obsessed With Your Name

div.div: Mind games.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VO0nKQ&via=Digg&text=Why Obama Is Obsessed With Your Name

div.div: GRAPHIC

div.a: Woman Grows A New Ear On Her Arm, Has It Attached To Her Head

div.div: Yep, this happened. Doctors at Johns Hopkins have attached a new ear to a patient that was grown on her own forearm. It's a medical first, and a heartwarming-if-a-little-yucky story.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P9BhRL&via=Digg&text=Woman Grows A New Ear On Her Arm, Has It Attached To Her Head

div.div: MORMON MEAN GIRLS

div.a: Mormon Chat Forum Dissects Ann Romney's 'Garments' (Or Lack Thereof)

div.div: Some members of the LDS church are concerned that Ann Romney might not be wearing "garments," a kind of underwear worn by most adult Mormons.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NRVTSF&via=Digg&text=Mormon Chat Forum Dissects Ann Romney's 'Garments' (Or Lack Thereof)

div.div: ZOMBIES IN PLAID SHIRTS
A reflection on what happens when only the rich have a place in the world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PnJAL6&via=Digg&text=The Post-Apocalyptic Tech Scene

div.div: IT'S THE ECONOMY, STUPID

div.a: Why Do Women Use Birth Control?

div.div: At a time when 8-plus percent of Americans are currently unemployed, it seems a little odd that the election season has reopened debate over a form of medical care that 99 percent of women use.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qbw5hi&via=Digg&text=Why Do Women Use Birth Control?
